body_html:
The LSTM cell in TF is consist of several Ops, which might not be supported by TF Lite (for now).
There are some pre-trained (and pre-converted to .tflite) LSTM models, like tts and speakerid under tensorflow/contrib/lite/models, and there is a implementation for LSTM Op (as a single op, not a combination of several ops) in TF Lite. However, it seems toco just cannot handle conversion between TF LSTM and TF Lite LSTM.
Really need some instructions on how to convert a LSTM model. 😞

There are some pre-trained (and pre-converted to .tflite) LSTM models, like tts and speakerid under tensorflow/contrib/lite/models, and there is a implementation for LSTM Op (as a single op, not a combination of several ops) in TF Lite. body:
The LSTM cell in TF is consist of several Ops, which might not be supported by TF Lite (for now). 
There are some pre-trained (and pre-converted to .tflite) LSTM models, like tts and speakerid under `tensorflow/contrib/lite/models`, and there is a implementation for LSTM Op (as a single op, not a combination of several ops) in TF Lite. However, it seems toco just cannot handle conversion between TF LSTM and TF Lite LSTM. 
Really need some instructions on how to convert a LSTM model. :disappointed:
